title: क्या दुबई में मुस्लिम औरतों ने मस्जिद में राम भजन गाया ? जानिये सच
author: www.factcrescendo.com
vclaim: इस वीडियो के नीचे लिखा है कि “A “Prashanthi” pilgrimage by the Region 94 of the Sai Organisation comprising the countries from Middle East and Gulf has enveloped Prasanthi Nilayam with Islamic Fervor. Devotees from Bahrain, Iran, Kuwait, Oman, Qatar, Saudi Arabia, Syria, Turkey and United Arab Emirates, provided an Arabic flavour in Prasanthi Nilayam”
